org.jmisb.api.video

Interface IVideoFileInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, IVideoInput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VideoFileInput

    public interface IVideoFileInput
extends IVideoInput
    Interface for reading video/metadata from a file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a file event listener.

      Get the total video file duration.

      Get the number of video frames.

      Get the current playback speed.

      Get the current playback position.

      Check if the video file is playing.

      Notify consumers that end of file has been reached.

      Pause video file playback.

      Seek to a specified position in the file.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jmisb.api.video.IVideoInput

    • Method Detail

      • play

        void play()
        Play the video file.

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        Check if the video file is playing.
        Returns:
        True if currently playing

      • setPlaybackSpeed

        void setPlaybackSpeed(double multiplier)
        Set the playback speed.
        Parameters:
        multiplier - The rate multiplier (e.g., 2.0 for 2x rate); Double.MAX_VALUE to read file as fast as possible

      • getPlaybackSpeed

        double getPlaybackSpeed()
        Get the current playback speed.
        Returns:
        The rate multiplier (e.g., 2.0 for 2x rate)

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause video file playback.

      • getDuration

        double getDuration()
        Get the total video file duration.
        Returns:
        The duration, in seconds

      • getPosition

        double getPosition()
        Get the current playback position.
        Returns:
        The current position, in seconds

      • seek

        void seek(double position)
        Seek to a specified position in the file.
        Parameters:
        position - The desired position, in seconds

      • getNumFrames

        int getNumFrames()
        Get the number of video frames.
        Returns:
        The total number of video frames in the file

      • addFileEventListener

        void addFileEventListener(IFileEventListener listener)
        Add a file event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to add

      • removeFileEventListener

        void removeFileEventListener(IFileEventListener listener)
        Remove a file event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to remove

      • notifyEOF

        void notifyEOF()
        Notify consumers that end of file has been reached.
